title: 1944년 Revhiem 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Sigurd Revheim v. Samuel B. Shankman, Appellants-Respondents
**판결일**: 1944-02-25
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Untermyer

## 인용

- 267 A.D. 865

## 판결문 요약


Judgment affirmed, without costs. No opinion. [See post, p. 976.] Martin, . P. J., Townley, Glennon and Dore, JJ., concur; Untermyer, J., dissents in opinion.
